headline: Dish Countersues Disney in Widening Legal Fight Over Sling Passes
summary: After defeating ESPN’s demand for an injunction to block its one-day “sling passes,” Dish Network has gone on offense by suing Disney, ESPN, ABC, FX and others for alleged antitrust and breach of contract claims. Dish accuses Disney of trying to monopolize the market for “skinny sports bundles,” meaning a group of channels designed for …

headline: Earnings Growth & Price Strength Make Walt Disney (DIS) a Stock to Watch
summary: Finding strong, market-beating stocks with a positive earnings outlook becomes easier with the Focus List, a top feature of the Zacks Premium portfolio service.

headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid DIS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the last six months, Disney’s shares have sunk to $114.05, producing a disappointing 7.4% loss - a stark contrast to the S&P 500’s 10.1% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
